text: phraxngkh khux phuthrng prathan khwam ngeiyb sngb lng ma nı citcı khxng brrda phu sraththa pheux phwk khea ca di pheimphun kar sraththa hı kab kar sraththa khxng phwk khea læa pen khx ngxallxhˌ khux phirphl hæng chan fa thanghlay læa phændin læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng rxbru phuthrng pricha yan semx
